overview: «Bliss» is about the end of the world and the end of the internet. The music created by Edgar Mondragón reflects about the saturation of digital files in post-internet world. So the images are intended to simulate chaotic atmospheres. Starting from the disintegration of various visual symbols, a campfire is superimposed on materials found on the internet mixed with personal audiovisual material that also simulates being part of the digital archive. Each layer is rhythmically and counterpoint interposed in order to think about the destruction of the world.
title: Bliss
